sentences.en: As we move into broadband, a wide range of e-commerce services will become available.
sentences.cn: 我们转入宽频传输领域后，将会提供多种电子商务服务。

sentences.en: At present, there are three strands to commerce clause theory.
sentences.cn: 在当前, 《商业条款》理论有3个组成部分.

sentences.en: Banks are the nerves of commerce.
Commerce binds the two countries together.
sentences.cn: 贸易把这两国结合在一起.

sentences.en: During the war, they laid an embargo on commerce with enemy countries.
sentences.cn: 在战争期间, 他们禁止与敌国通商.

sentences.en: measures promoting local commerce and industry
sentences.cn: 促进地方工商业发展的措施

sentences.en: Mercury was the presiding divinity over commerce.
Such legislation is virtually immune from restriction under the commerce clause.
sentences.cn: 按照《商业条款》,该立法不受限制的影响.

sentences.en: The business is no longer regarded as a citadel of commerce.
sentences.cn: 该行业不再被视为贸易的堡垒。

sentences.en: The marketplace was where commerce was traditionally carried on.
sentences.cn: 这个集市是传统的贸易场所.

sentences.en: Then the Chamber of Commerce offices in Bellingham and Seattle.
sentences.cn: 然后是贝灵汉和西雅图的商会办公室.

sentences.en: There were notable jousts with the Secretary of Commerce.
sentences.cn: 和商业部长之间明显存在竞争。

sentences.en: There's been a dramatic shift away from traditional careers towards business and commerce.
sentences.cn: 从传统职业转向商贸领域的巨大转变已然发生了。

sentences.en: They have made their fortunes from industry and commerce.

trans.tran_en: the buying and selling of goods and services
